name: 戦国キャノン -SENGOKU ACE EPISODE III-
summary: Although Psikyo more or less collapsed around 2001, some of its members went on to form X-Nauts (pronounced “Cross-Nauts”), who did the PS2 Cho Aniki game, among other things. In 2005, they also resurrected the Sengoku Acelabel for a new PSP game, dubbed Sengoku Cannon.
info:
• 中文名: 战国加农
  • 开发: 彩京
  • 别名: Sengoku Cannon: Sengoku Ace Episode III
  • 别名: Samurai Aces III: Sengoku Cannon
  • 平台: PSP
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 横版STG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2005年7月28日
  • 发行: クロスノーツ
